Mr. Hatfield:

Mr. McCubbin: In the year 1946-47 potatoes were purchased by the agricultural prices support board from producers in New Brunsâ€” wick at $1.50 per barrel (165 pounds), pro- vided the potatoes contained at least 70 per cent Canada No. 1 grade. 2. If so. -what steps are being taken in this con- nection?

Mr. McIlraith:
